name: Gemsbooper
description:
Gemsbooper is a Bejewled clone made for modern browsers using oCanvas, jQuery and Underscore.

Drag gems to swap them and align 3 or more to score points.

It is open source and you can check out the code and file issues at https://bitbucket.org/Efi_Kittenhugger/gemsbooper.

Have fun!
